column5: ...OK so  tell me Im not the only one who looks at the ribbons and bows on presents thinking .... wow - look at those colours ....  This was my project during cleanup yesterday  ... look out lakers and specks !
Looks good to me! I think Christmas tree tinsel would work pretty good too.
seen tinsel used on howie flies and jigs from the christmas tree!@!
send some over to TJ he can add them to his tree next year
They look great. Should do well with the lakers as they seem to love the white jigs. Let us know how they work.
Exactly what I was thinking Smokey .. when I saw that pearly irridescent glitter .... Lakers (and deep water Specks) came to mind ... if we ever get any ice I'll post a pic or two
I herd muskies like the tinsel.  Seen these on ebay.    Sorry, here it is.
